subject: Marathon Running
Hurricane Sandy (2012)
lead_paragraph: The New Jersey Marathon, to be run May 5, had to be rerouted because of Hurricane Sandy, but the race’s organizer said there was never a doubt that it would be held.
snippet: The New Jersey Marathon, to be run May 5, had to be rerouted because of Hurricane Sandy, but the race’s organizer said there was never a doubt that it would be held.
